title: Ticket #2777: IPv6: Expunge dead code
description:
The IPv6 work left a bunch of dead code behind. Some is IPv4 code that has been replaced. Some is experimental IPv6 work that was replaced. Much of it is commented out. This code should be removed. In some cases the code is part of the unit tests; we might want to keep the commented-out code present as a basis for a future IPv6 test (#2526)

When cleaning, track down all references to the dead code. Sometimes this will reveal further dead code, be it entire functions, or commented out sections.

Entirely dead code:

  • sin_to_string
  • condor_gethostbyname*
  • condor_gethostbyaddr*
  • ipv6_addr_to_hostname
  • address_to_sin
  • string_to_sin
  • sin_to_ipstring
  • get_nodns_addr
  • get_nodns_hostent
  • convert_fake_hostname_to_ip
  • convert_ip_to_fake_hostname

Move into single caller:

  • sock_peer_to_string
remarks:
2018-Jan-17 10:02:46 by jfrey:
Internal change, no docs required.
